   20: -module(ssl_dist_bench_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% CT meta
   29: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases
   35: -export(
   36:    [setup/1,
   37:     parallel_setup/1,
   38:     roundtrip/1,
   39:     sched_utilization/1,
   40:     mean_load_cpu_margin/1,
   41:     throughput_0/1,
   42:     throughput_64/1,
   43:     throughput_1024/1,
   44:     throughput_4096/1,
   45:     throughput_16384/1,
   46:     throughput_65536/1,
   47:     throughput_262144/1,
   48:     throughput_1048576/1]).
   49: 
   50: %% Debug
   51: -export([payload/1, roundtrip_runner/3, setup_runner/3, throughput_runner/4,
   52:         mem/0]).
   53: 
   54: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: 
   56: suite() -> [{ct_hooks, [{ts_install_cth, [{nodenames, 2}]}]}].
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [{group, smoketest}].
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [{smoketest, protocols()},
   63:      {benchmark, protocols()},
   64:      %%
   65:      %% protocols()
   66:      {ssl,         ssl_backends()},
   67:      {cryptcookie, cryptcookie_backends()},
   68:      {plain,       categories()},
   69:      {socket,      categories()},
   70:      %%
   71:      %% ssl_backends()
   72:      {tls,  categories()},
   73:      {ktls, categories()},
   74:      %%
   75:      %% cryptcookie_backends()
   76:      {dist_cryptcookie_socket, categories()},
   77:      {cryptcookie_socket_ktls, categories()},
   78:      {dist_cryptcookie_inet,   categories()},
   79:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls,   categories()},
   80:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, categories()},
   81:      %%
   82:      %% categories()
   83:      {setup, [{repeat, 1}],
   84:       [setup,
   85:        parallel_setup]},
   86:      {roundtrip, [{repeat, 1}], [roundtrip]},
   87:      {sched_utilization,[{repeat, 1}],
   88:       [sched_utilization,
   89:        mean_load_cpu_margin]},
   90:      {throughput, [{repeat, 1}],
   91:       [throughput_0,
   92:        throughput_64,
   93:        throughput_1024,
   94:        throughput_4096,
   95:        throughput_16384,
   96:        throughput_65536,
   97:        throughput_262144,
   98:        throughput_1048576]}].
   99: 
  100: protocols() ->
  101:     [{group, ssl},
  102:      {group, cryptcookie},
  103:      {group, plain},
  104:      {group, socket}].
  105: 
  106: ssl_backends() ->
  107:     [{group, tls},
  108:      {group, ktls}].
  109: 
  110: cryptcookie_backends() ->
  111:     [{group, dist_cryptcookie_socket},
  112:      {group, cryptcookie_socket_ktls},
  113:      {group, dist_cryptcookie_inet},
  114:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls},
  115:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih}].
  116: 
  117: categories() ->
  118:     [{group, setup},
  119:      {group, roundtrip},
  120:      {group, throughput},
  121:      {group, sched_utilization}
  122:     ].
  123: 
  124: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  125:     Digest = sha256,
  126:     ECCurve = secp521r1,
  127: %%%     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.2',
  128: %%%     TLSCipher =
  129: %%%         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  130: %%%           cipher       => aes_128_cbc,
  131: %%%           mac          => sha256,
  132: %%%           prf          => sha256},
  133:     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.3',
  134:     TLSCipher =
  135:         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  136:           cipher       => aes_256_gcm,
  137:           mac          => aead,
  138:           prf          => sha384},
  139:     %%
  140:     Node = node(),
  141:     Skip = make_ref(),
  142:     try
  143:         Node =/= nonode@nohost orelse
  144:             throw({Skip,"Node not distributed"}),
  145:         verify_node_src_addr(),
  146:         {supported, SSLVersions} =
  147:             lists:keyfind(supported, 1, ssl:versions()),
  148:         lists:member(TLSVersion, SSLVersions) orelse
  149:             throw(
  150:               {Skip,
  151:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSVersion)}),
  152: %%%         lists:member(ECCurve, ssl:eccs(TLSVersion)) orelse
  153: %%%             throw(
  154: %%%               {Skip,
  155: %%%                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(ECCurve)}),
  156:         TLSCipherKeys = maps:keys(TLSCipher),
  157:         lists:any(
  158:           fun (Cipher) ->
  159:                   maps:with(TLSCipherKeys, Cipher) =:= TLSCipher
  160:           end,
  161:           ssl:cipher_suites(default, TLSVersion)) orelse
  162:             throw(
  163:               {Skip,
  164:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSCipher)}),
  165:         %%
  166:         %%
  167:         %%
  168:         CertOptions =
  169:             [{digest, Digest},
  170:              {key, {namedCurve, ECCurve}}],
  171:         RootCert =
  172:             public_key:pkix_test_root_cert(
  173:               ?MODULE_STRING ++ " ROOT CA", CertOptions),
  174:         SSLConf =
  175:             [{verify, verify_peer},
  176:              {versions, [TLSVersion]},
  177:              {ciphers, [TLSCipher]}],
  178:         ServerConf =
  179:             [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  180:              {verify_fun,
  181:               {fun inet_tls_dist:verify_client/3,[]}}
  182:             | SSLConf],
  183:         ClientConf = SSLConf,
  184:         %%
  185:         PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  186:         %%
  187:         ServerNode = ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(dist_server),
  188:         [_, ServerHost] = split_node(ServerNode),
  189:         ServerName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_server",
  190:         ServerString = ServerName ++ "@" ++ ServerHost,
  191:         ServerConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ServerString ++ ".conf"),
  192:         Server = list_to_atom(ServerString),
  193:         %%
  194:         write_node_conf(
  195:           ServerConfFile, Server, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  196:           CertOptions, RootCert),
  197:         %%
  198:         Schedulers =
  199:             erpc:call(ServerNode, erlang, system_info, [schedulers]),
  200:         [_, ClientHost] = split_node(Node),
  201:         [{server_node, ServerNode},
  202:          {server_name, ServerName},
  203:          {server, Server},
  204:          {server_dist_args,
  205:           "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  206:           "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ServerConfFile ++ " "},
  207:          {clients, Schedulers} |
  208:          init_client_node(
  209:            ClientHost, Schedulers, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  210:            CertOptions, RootCert, Config)]
  211:     catch
  212:         throw : {Skip, Reason} ->
  213:             {skip, Reason};
  214:         throw : {skipped, Reason} ->
  215:             {skip, Reason};
  216:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  217:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  218:     end.
  219: 
  220: init_client_node(
  221:   _ClientHost, 0, _PrivDir, _ServerConf, _ClientConf,
  222:   _CertOptions, _RootCert, Config) ->
  223:     Config;
  224: init_client_node(
  225:   ClientHost, N, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  226:   CertOptions, RootCert, Config) ->
  227:     ClientName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_client_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  228:     ClientString = ClientName ++ "@" ++ ClientHost,
  229:     ClientConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ClientString ++ ".conf"),
  230:     Client = list_to_atom(ClientString),
  231:     %%
  232:     write_node_conf(
  233:       ClientConfFile, Client, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  234:       CertOptions, RootCert),
  235:     init_client_node(
  236:       ClientHost, N - 1, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  237:       CertOptions, RootCert,
  238:       [{{client_name, N}, ClientName},
  239:        {{client, N}, Client},
  240:        {{client_dist_args, N},
  241:         "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  242:         "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ClientConfFile ++ " "} | Config]).
  243: 
  244: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  245:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  246:     ssl_bench_test_lib:cleanup(ServerNode).
  247: 
  248: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  249:     [{effort,10}|Config];
  250: %%
  251: init_per_group(ssl, Config) ->
  252:     [{ssl_dist, true}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "SSL"}|Config];
  253: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_socket, Config) ->
  254:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_socket:supported() of
  255:         ok ->
  256:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket"},
  257:              {ssl_dist_args,
  258:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_socket"}
  259:             | Config];
  260:         Problem ->
  261:             {skip, Problem}
  262:     catch
  263:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  264:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  265:     end;
  266: init_per_group(cryptcookie_socket_ktls, Config) ->
  267:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_socket_ktls:supported() of
  268:         ok ->
  269:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket-kTLS"},
  270:              {ssl_dist_args,
  271:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_socket_ktls"}
  272:             | Config];
  273:         Problem ->
  274:             {skip, Problem}
  275:     catch
  276:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  277:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  278:     end;
  279: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_inet, Config) ->
  280:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_inet:supported() of
  281:         ok ->
  282:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet"},
  283:              {ssl_dist_args,
  284:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_inet"}
  285:             | Config];
  286:         Problem ->
  287:             {skip, Problem}
  288:     catch
  289:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  290:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  291:     end;
  292: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls, Config) ->
  293:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  294:         ok ->
  295:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS"},
  296:              {ssl_dist_args,
  297:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  298:               "-inet_ktls port"}
  299:             | Config];
  300:         Problem ->
  301:             {skip, Problem}
  302:     catch
  303:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  304:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  305:     end;
  306: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, Config) ->
  307:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  308:         ok ->
  309:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS-IH"},
  310:              {ssl_dist_args,
  311:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  312:               "-inet_ktls input_handler"}
  313:             | Config];
  314:         Problem ->
  315:             {skip, Problem}
  316:     catch
  317:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  318:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  319:     end;
  320: init_per_group(plain, Config) ->
  321:     [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Plain"}|Config];
  322: %%
  323: init_per_group(socket, Config) ->
  324:     try inet_epmd_socket:supported() of
  325:         ok ->
  326:             [{ssl_dist, false},
  327:              {ssl_dist_prefix, "Socket"},
  328:              {ssl_dist_args,
  329:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd socket"}
  330:             | Config];
  331:         Problem ->
  332:             {skip, Problem}
  333:     catch
  334:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  335:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  336:     end;
  337: %%
  338: init_per_group(ktls, Config) ->
  339:     case ktls_supported() of
  340:         ok ->
  341:             [{ktls, true},
  342:              {ssl_dist_prefix,
  343:               proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config) ++ "-kTLS"}
  344:             | proplists:delete(ssl_dist_prefix, Config)];
  345:         {error, Reason} ->
  346:             {skip, Reason}
  347:     end;
  348: %%
  349: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  350:     Config.
  351: 
  352: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  353:     ok.
  354: 
  355: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
  356:     case proplists:is_defined(effort, Conf) of
  357:         false ->
  358:             %% Not a benchmark run
  359:             case atom_to_list(Func) of
  360:                 "throughput_64" ->
  361:                     Conf;
  362:                 "throughput_"++_ ->
  363:                     {skipped, "Benchmarks run separately"};
  364:                 _ ->
  365:                     Conf
  366:             end;
  367:         true ->
  368:             Conf
  369:     end.
  370: 
  371: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Conf) ->
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: 
  375: ktls_supported() ->
  376:     {ok, Listen} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}]),
  377:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
  378:     {ok, Client} =
  379:         gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port, [{active, false}]),
  380:     try
  381:         maybe
  382:             {ok, OS} ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_os(),
  383:             ok ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_ulp(Client, OS),
  384:             ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_cipher(Client, OS, tx, 1)
  385:         end
  386:     after
  387:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  388:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Listen)
  389:     end.
  390: 
  391: 
  392: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  393: %%% CommonTest API helpers
  394: 
  395: verify_node_src_addr() ->
  396:     Msg = "Hello, world!",
  397:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  398:     {ok,DstAddr} = inet:getaddr(Host, inet),
  399:     {ok,Socket} = gen_udp:open(0, [{active,false}]),
  400:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  401:     ok = gen_udp:send(Socket, DstAddr, Port, Msg),
  402:     %% Ubuntu has got 127.0.1.1 in /etc/hosts, but that IP address is
  403:     %% not assigned to the interface.
  404:     %% `ip addr add 127.0.1.1 dev lo` as root solves that problem
  405:     case gen_udp:recv(Socket, length(Msg) + 1, 1000) of
  406:         {ok,{DstAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  407:             ok;
  408:         {ok,{SrcAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  409:             throw({skipped,
  410:                    "Src and dst address mismatch: " ++
  411:                        term_to_string(SrcAddr) ++ " =:= " ++
  412:                        term_to_string(DstAddr)});
  413:         Weird ->
  414:             error(Weird)
  415:     end.
  416: 
  417: write_node_conf(
  418:   ConfFile, Node, ServerConf, ClientConf, CertOptions, RootCert) ->
  419:     [Name,Host] = split_node(Node),
  420:     Conf =
  421:         public_key:pkix_test_data(
  422:           #{root => RootCert,
  423:             peer =>
  424:                 [{extensions,
  425:                   [
  426:                    #'Extension'{
  427:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  428:                       extnValue = [{dNSName, Host}],
  429:                       critical = true},
  430:                    #'Extension'{
  431:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  432:                       extnValue =
  433:                           [{directoryName,
  434:                             {rdnSequence,
  435:                              [[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{
  436:                                   type = ?'id-at-commonName',
  437:                                   value =
  438:                                       {utf8String,
  439:                                        unicode:characters_to_binary(
  440:                                          Name, utf8)
  441:                                       }
  442:                                  }]]}}],
  443:                       critical = true}
  444:                   ]} | CertOptions]}),
  445:     NodeConf =
  446:         [{server, ServerConf ++ Conf}, {client, ClientConf ++ Conf}],
  447:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
  448:     ok = file:change_mode(ConfFile, 8#400),
  449:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [NodeConf]),
  450:     ok = file:close(Fd).
  451: 
  452: split_node(Node) ->
  453:     string:split(atom_to_list(Node), "@").
  454: 
  455: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  456: %%% Test cases
  457: 
  458: %%-----------------------
  459: %% Connection setup speed
  460: 
  461: setup(Config) ->
  462:     run_nodepair_test(fun setup/6, Config).
  463: 
  464: setup(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  465:     Rounds = 100 * Effort,
  466:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  467:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  468:     pong = ssl_apply(HA, net_adm, ping, [B]),
  469:     _ = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  470:     {Log, Before, After} =
  471:         ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  472:     ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  473:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  474:     ChildCountResult =
  475:         ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(
  476:           HA, supervisor, count_children, [tls_dist_connection_sup]),
  477:     ?CT_LOG("TLS Connection Child Count Result: ~p", [ChildCountResult]),
  478:     {SetupTime, CycleTime} =
  479:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  480:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> setup_wait_nodedown(A, 10000) end),
  481:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  482:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  483:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  484:     SetupSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / SetupTime),
  485:     CycleSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / CycleTime),
  486:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  487:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  488:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  489:     report(Prefix++" Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s " ++ MemSuffix).
  490: 
  491: %% Runs on node A against rex in node B
  492: setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  493:     StartTime = start_time(),
  494:     SetupTime = setup_loop(A, B, 0, Rounds),
  495:     {microseconds(SetupTime), microseconds(elapsed_time(StartTime))}.
  496: 
  497: setup_loop(_A, _B, T, 0) ->
  498:     T;
  499: setup_loop(A, B, T, N) ->
  500:     StartTime = start_time(),
  501:     try erpc:call(B, net_adm, ping, [A]) of
  502:         pong -> ok;
  503:         Other ->
  504:             error({N,Other})
  505:     catch
  506:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  507:             erlang:raise(Class, {N,Reason}, Stacktrace)
  508:     end,
  509:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  510:     [N,B] = [N|erlang:nodes()],
  511:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, {rex,B}),
  512:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(B),
  513:     receive
  514:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_,_} ->
  515:             [] = erlang:nodes(),
  516:             setup_loop(A, B, Time + T, N - 1)
  517:     end.
  518: 
  519: setup_wait_nodedown(A, Time) ->
  520:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  521:     case nodes() of
  522:         [] ->
  523:             ok;
  524:         [A] ->
  525:             receive
  526:                 {nodedown,A} ->
  527:                     ok;
  528:                 Unexpected ->
  529:                     {error,{unexpected,Unexpected}}
  530:             after Time ->
  531:                     {error,timeout}
  532:             end
  533:     end.
  534: 
  535: 
  536: set_cpu_affinity(client) ->
  537:     set_cpu_affinity(1);
  538: set_cpu_affinity(server) ->
  539:     set_cpu_affinity(2);
  540: set_cpu_affinity(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
  541:     case erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) of
  542:         undefined ->
  543:             {"", undefined, undefined};
  544:         CpuTopology ->
  545:             Log = taskset(element(Index, split_cpus(CpuTopology))),
  546:             %% Update Schedulers
  547:             _ = erlang:system_info(update_cpu_info),
  548:             Schedulers = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  549:             {Log,
  550:              erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, Schedulers),
  551:              Schedulers}
  552:     end.
  553: 
  554: taskset(LogicalProcessors) ->
  555:     os:cmd(
  556:       "taskset -c -p " ++
  557:           lists:flatten(
  558:             lists:join(
  559:               ",",
  560:               [integer_to_list(Id) || Id <- LogicalProcessors]),
  561:             " ") ++ os:getpid()).
  562: 
  563: split_cpus([{_Tag, List}]) ->
  564:     split_cpus(List);
  565: split_cpus(List = [_ | _]) ->
  566:     {A, B} = lists:split(length(List) bsr 1, List),
  567:     {logical_processors(A), logical_processors(B)}.
  568: 
  569: logical_processors([{_Tag, {logical, Id}} | Items]) ->
  570:     [Id | logical_processors(Items)];
  571: logical_processors([{_Tag, List} | Items]) ->
  572:     logical_processors(List) ++ logical_processors(Items);
  573: logical_processors([]) ->
  574:     [].
  575: 
  576: 
  577: %%----------------
  578: %% Parallel setup
  579: 
  580: parallel_setup(Config) ->
  581:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  582:     parallel_setup(Config, Clients, Clients, []).
  583: 
  584: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I, HNs) when 0 < I ->
  585:     Key = {client, I},
  586:     Node = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  587:     Handle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config),
  588:     _ = ssl_apply(Handle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  589:     try
  590:         parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I - 1, [{Handle, Node} | HNs])
  591:     after
  592:         stop_ssl_node(Key, Handle, Config)
  593:     end;
  594: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, _0, HNs) ->
  595:     Key = server,
  596:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  597:     ServerHandle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config, 0),
  598:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
  599:     TotalRounds = 1000 * Effort,
  600:     Rounds = round(TotalRounds / Clients),
  601:     try
  602:         {Log, Before, After} =
  603:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  604:         ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  605:         ServerMemBefore =
  606:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  607:         parallel_setup_result(
  608:           Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore,
  609:           [parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds)
  610:            || {Handle, Node} <- HNs])
  611:     after
  612:         stop_ssl_node(Key, ServerHandle, Config)
  613:     end.
  614: 
  615: parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds) ->
  616:     Collector = self(),
  617:     Tag = make_ref(),
  618:     _ =
  619:         spawn_link(
  620:           fun () ->
  621:                   Collector !
  622:                       {Tag,
  623:                        try
  624:                            MemBefore =
  625:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  626:                            Result =
  627:                                ssl_apply(
  628:                                  Handle, ?MODULE, setup_runner,
  629:                                  [Node, ServerNode, Rounds]),
  630:                            MemAfter =
  631:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  632:                            {MemBefore, Result, MemAfter}
  633:                        catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  634:                                {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}
  635:                        end}
  636:           end),
  637:     Tag.
  638: 
  639: parallel_setup_result(
  640:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags) ->
  641:     parallel_setup_result(
  642:       Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  643:       0, 0, 0).
  644: %%
  645: parallel_setup_result(
  646:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [Tag | Tags],
  647:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  648:     receive
  649:         {Tag, {Mem1, {ST, CT}, Mem2}}
  650:           when is_integer(ST), is_integer(CT) ->
  651:             parallel_setup_result(
  652:               Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  653:               SetupTime + ST, CycleTime + CT, Mem + Mem2 - Mem1);
  654:         {Tag, Error} ->
  655:             exit(Error)
  656:     end;
  657: parallel_setup_result(
  658:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [],
  659:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  660:     ServerMemAfter =
  661:         ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  662:     ServerMem = ServerMemAfter - ServerMemBefore,
  663:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  664:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  665:     SetupSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (SetupTime/1000000)),
  666:     CycleSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (CycleTime/1000000)),
  667:     {MemC, MemS, MemSuffix} = mem_result({Mem / Clients, ServerMem}),
  668:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Clients", MemC, "KByte"),
  669:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Server", MemS, "KByte"),
  670:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  671:     report(
  672:       Prefix++" Parallel Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s "
  673:       ++ MemSuffix).
  674: 
  675: %%----------------
  676: %% Roundtrip speed
  677: 
  678: roundtrip(Config) ->
  679:     run_nodepair_test(fun roundtrip/6, Config).
  680: 
  681: roundtrip(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  682:     Rounds = 4000 * Effort,
  683:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  684:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  685:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  686:     ok = ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, allow, [[B]]),
  687:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, allow, [[A]]),
  688:     Time = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  689:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  690:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  691:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  692:     Speed = round((Rounds*1000000) / Time),
  693:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  694:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  695:     report(Prefix++" Roundtrip", Speed, "pings/s " ++ MemSuffix).
  696: 
  697: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  698: roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  699:     ClientPid = self(),
  700:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  701:     ServerPid =
  702:         erlang:spawn(
  703:           B,
  704:           fun () ->
  705:                   roundtrip_server(ClientPid, Rounds)
  706:           end),
  707:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
  708:     roundtrip_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, start_time(), Rounds).
  709: 
  710: roundtrip_server(_Pid, 0) ->
  711:     exit(ok);
  712: roundtrip_server(Pid, N) ->
  713:     receive
  714:         N ->
  715:             Pid ! N,
  716:             roundtrip_server(Pid, N-1)
  717:     end.
  718: 
  719: roundtrip_client(_Pid, Mon, StartTime, 0) ->
  720:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  721:     receive
  722:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, ok} ->
  723:             Time;
  724:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
  725:             exit(Other)
  726:     end;
  727: roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N) ->
  728:     Pid ! N,
  729:     receive
  730:         N ->
  731:             roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N - 1)
  732:     end.
  733: 
  734: %%---------------------------------------
  735: %% Scheduler utilization at constant load
  736: 
  737: 
  738: sched_utilization(Config) ->
  739:     run_nodepair_test(
  740:       fun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  741:               sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config)
  742:       end, Config).
  743: 
  744: sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config) ->
  745:     SSL = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config),
  746:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  747:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  748:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  749:     PidA = ssl_apply(HA, os, getpid, []),
  750:     PidB = ssl_apply(HB, os, getpid, []),
  751:     ?CT_PAL("Starting scheduler utilization run effort ~w:~n"
  752:            "    [~s] ~w~n"
  753:            "    [~s] ~w~n",
  754:            [Effort, PidA, A, PidB, B]),
  755:     {ClientMsacc, ServerMsacc, BusyDistPortMsgs} =
  756:         ssl_apply(
  757:           HA,
  758:           fun () ->
  759:                   Result = sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, SSL, Config),
  760:                   fs_log(
  761:                     Config,
  762:                     "sched_utilization.Result", Result),
  763:                   Result
  764:           end),
  765:     ?CT_LOG("Got ~p busy_dist_port msgs",[tail(BusyDistPortMsgs)]),
  766:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  767:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  768:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  769:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [A]),
  770:     msacc:print(ClientMsacc),
  771:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [B]),
  772:     msacc:print(ServerMsacc),
  773:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of B from A: ~p",
  774:            [ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, node_info, [B])]),
  775:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of A from B: ~p",
  776:            [ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, node_info, [A])]),
  777:     SchedUtilClient =
  778:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ClientMsacc) /
  779:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ClientMsacc)),
  780:     SchedUtilServer =
  781:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ServerMsacc) /
  782:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ServerMsacc)),
  783:     Verdict =
  784:         if
  785:             BusyDistPortMsgs =:= 0 ->
  786:                 "";
  787:             is_integer(BusyDistPortMsgs) ->
  788:                 " ?";
  789:             true ->
  790:                 ?CT_LOG("Stray Msgs: ~p", [BusyDistPortMsgs]),
  791:                 " ???"
  792:         end,
  793:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Client Mem", MemA, "KByte"),
  794:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server Mem", MemB, "KByte"),
  795:     {comment, ClientComment} =
  796:         report(Prefix ++ " Sched Utilization Client" ++ Verdict,
  797:                SchedUtilClient, " %" ++ Verdict),
  798:     {comment, ServerComment} =
  799:         report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server" ++ Verdict,
  800:                SchedUtilServer, " %" ++ Verdict),
  801:     {comment,
  802:      "Client " ++ ClientComment ++ ", Server " ++ ServerComment ++
  803:          " " ++ MemSuffix}.
  804: 
  805: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  806: %% We want to avoid getting busy_dist_port as it hides the true SU usage
  807: %% of the receiver and sender.
  808: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, true, Config) ->
  809:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  810: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, false, Config) ->
  811:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  812: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, Senders, Config) ->
  813:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  814:     Payload = payload(100),
  815:     Time = 1000 * Effort,
  816:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  817:     ServerPids =
  818:         [erlang:spawn_link(
  819:            B, fun () -> throughput_server() end)
  820:          || _ <- lists:seq(1, Senders)],
  821:     Tag = make_ref(),
  822:     ServerMsacc =
  823:         erlang:spawn_link(
  824:           B,
  825:           fun() ->
  826:                   receive
  827:                       {start,Tag,Pid} ->
  828:                           fs_log(
  829:                             Config,
  830:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc.self",
  831:                             self()),
  832:                           msacc:start(Time),
  833:                           fs_log(
  834:                             Config,
  835:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:start",
  836:                             ok),
  837:                           receive
  838:                               {done,Tag,Pid} ->
  839:                                   fs_log(
  840:                                     Config,
  841:                                     "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  842:                                     ok),
  843:                                   ServerStats = msacc:stats(),
  844:                                   fs_log(Config,
  845:                                          "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  846:                                          ServerStats),
  847:                                   exit({result,Tag,ServerStats})
  848:                           end
  849:                   end
  850:           end),
  851:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[busy_dist_port]),
  852:     %% We spawn 100 senders that send a message every 10 ms
  853:     %% which should produce a load of 10000 msgs/s with
  854:     %% payload 100 bytes each -> 1 MByte/s
  855:     _Clients =
  856:         [spawn_link(
  857:            fun() ->
  858:                    throughput_client(Pid, Payload)
  859:            end) || Pid <- ServerPids],
  860:     %%
  861:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  862:     ServerMsacc ! {start,Tag,self()},
  863:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.self", self()),
  864:     msacc:start(Time),
  865:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc:start", ok),
  866:     ClientMsaccStats = msacc:stats(),
  867:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc.stats", ClientMsaccStats),
  868:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  869:     ServerMsacc ! {done,Tag,self()},
  870:     ServerMsaccStats =
  871:         receive
  872:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,{result,Tag,Stats}} ->
  873:                 Stats;
  874:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,Other} ->
  875:                 exit({other,ServerMsacc,Other})
  876:         end,
  877:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.ServerMsaccStats", ServerMsaccStats),
  878:     %%
  879:     {ClientMsaccStats,ServerMsaccStats, busy_dist_port_msgs()}.
  880: 
  881: fs_log(Config, Name, Term) ->
  882:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  883:     DistPrefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  884:     _ = file:write_file(
  885:           filename:join(PrivDir, DistPrefix ++ "_" ++ Name),
  886:           io_lib:format(
  887:             "~p~n",
  888:             [{{erlang:unique_integer([positive,monotonic]),
  889:                os:system_time(1000000)},
  890:              Term}])),
  891:     ok.
  892: 
  893: busy_dist_port_msgs() ->
  894:     busy_dist_port_msgs(0).
  895: %%
  896: busy_dist_port_msgs(N) ->
  897:     receive
  898:         M ->
  899:             case M of
  900:                 {monitor, P1, busy_dist_port, P2}
  901:                   when is_pid(P1), is_pid(P2) ->
  902:                     busy_dist_port_msgs(N + 1);
  903:                 Stray ->
  904:                     [Stray | busy_dist_port_msgs(N)]
  905:             end
  906:     after 0 ->
  907:             N
  908:     end.
  909: 
  910: tail([_|Tail]) ->
  911:     tail(Tail);
  912: tail(Tail) ->
  913:     Tail.
  914: 
  915: throughput_server() ->
  916:     receive _ -> ok end,
  917:     receive _ -> ok end,
  918:     receive _ -> ok end,
  919:     receive _ -> ok end,
  920:     receive _ -> ok end,
  921:     receive _ -> ok end,
  922:     receive _ -> ok end,
  923:     receive _ -> ok end,
  924:     receive _ -> ok end,
  925:     receive _ -> ok end,
  926:     throughput_server().
  927: 
  928: throughput_client(Pid, Payload) ->
  929:     Pid ! Payload,
  930:     receive after 10 -> throughput_client(Pid, Payload) end.
  931: 
  932: %%-----------------
  933: %% Mean load CPU margin
  934: %%
  935: %% Start pairs of processes with the client on node A
  936: %% and the server on node B.  The clients sends requests
  937: %% with random interval and payload and the servers reply
  938: %% immediately.
  939: %%
  940: %% Also, besides each server there is a compute process
  941: %% that does CPU work with low process priority and we measure
  942: %% how much such work that gets done.
  943: 
  944: mean_load_cpu_margin(Config) ->
  945:     run_nodepair_test(fun run_mlcm/6, Config).
  946: 
  947: -define(MLCM_NO, 100).
  948: 
  949: run_mlcm(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  950:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  951:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  952:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  953:     pong = ssl_apply(HB, net_adm, ping, [A]),
  954:     Count = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> mlcm(B, Effort) end),
  955:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  956:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  957:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  958:     report(
  959:       Prefix++" CPU Margin",
  960:       round(Count/?MLCM_NO/Effort),
  961:       "stones " ++ MemSuffix).
  962: 
  963: mlcm(Node, Effort) ->
  964:     Payloads = mlcm_payloads(),
  965:     Clients =
  966:         [mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) || _ <- lists:seq(1, ?MLCM_NO)],
  967:     receive after 1000 * Effort -> ok end,
  968:     [Alias ! {Alias,stop} || {_Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  969:     Counts =
  970:         [receive
  971:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,{Alias, Count}} ->
  972:                  Count;
  973:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
  974:                  exit(Reason)
  975:          end || {Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  976:     lists:sum(Counts).
  977: 
  978: mlcm_payloads() ->
  979:     Bin = list_to_binary([rand:uniform(256) - 1 || _ <- lists:seq(1, 512)]),
  980:     lists:foldl(
  981:       fun (N, Payloads) ->
  982:               Payloads#{N => binary:copy(Bin, N)}
  983:       end, #{}, lists:seq(0, 255)).
  984: 
  985: %%-------
  986: 
  987: mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) ->
  988:     Parent = self(),
  989:     StartRef = make_ref(),
  990:     {_,Monitor} =
  991:         spawn_monitor(
  992:           fun () ->
  993:                   Alias = alias(),
  994:                   Parent ! {StartRef, Alias},
  995:                   Server = mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias),
  996:                   mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, 0)
  997:           end),
  998:     receive
  999:         {StartRef, Alias} ->
 1000:             {Monitor, Alias};
 1001:         {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
 1002:             exit(Reason)
 1003:     end.
 1004: 
 1005: mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq) ->
 1006:     {Time, Index} = mlcm_rand(),
 1007:     Payload = maps:get(Index, Payloads),
 1008:     receive after Time -> ok end,
 1009:     Server ! {Alias, Seq, Payload},
 1010:     receive
 1011:         {Alias, Seq, Pl} when byte_size(Pl) =:= byte_size(Payload) ->
 1012:             mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq + 1);
 1013:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
 1014:             Server ! Msg,
 1015:             receive after infinity -> ok end
 1016:     end.
 1017: 
 1018: %% Approximate normal distribution Index with an average of 6 uniform bytes
 1019: %% and use the 7:th byte for uniform Time
 1020: mlcm_rand() ->
 1021:     mlcm_rand(6, rand:uniform(1 bsl (1+6)*8) - 1, 0).
 1022: %%
 1023: mlcm_rand(0, X, I) ->
 1024:     Time = X + 1, % 1..256
 1025:     Index = abs((I - 3*256) div 3), % 0..255 upper half or normal distribution
 1026:     {Time, Index};
 1027: mlcm_rand(N, X, I) ->
 1028:     mlcm_rand(N - 1, X bsr 8, I + (X band 255)).
 1029: 
 1030: %%-------
 1031: 
 1032: mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias) ->
 1033:     spawn_link(
 1034:       Node,
 1035:       fun () ->
 1036:               Compute = mlcm_compute_start(Alias),
 1037:               mlcm_server(Alias, 0, Compute)
 1038:       end).
 1039: 
 1040: mlcm_server(Alias, Seq, Compute) ->
 1041:     receive
 1042:         {Alias, Seq, _Payload} = Msg ->
 1043:             Alias ! Msg,
 1044:       mlcm_server(Alias, Seq + 1, Compute);
 1045:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
 1046:             Compute ! Msg,
 1047:             receive after infinity -> om end
 1048:     end.
 1049: 
 1050: %%-------
 1051: 
 1052: mlcm_compute_start(Alias) ->
 1053:     spawn_opt(
 1054:       fun () ->
 1055:               rand:seed(exro928ss),
 1056:               mlcm_compute(Alias, 0, 0)
 1057:       end,
 1058:       [link, {priority,low}]).
 1059: 
 1060: mlcm_compute(Alias, State, Count) ->
 1061:     receive {Alias, stop} -> exit({Alias, Count})
 1062:     after 0 -> ok
 1063:     end,
 1064:     mlcm_compute(
 1065:       Alias,
 1066:       %% CPU payload
 1067:       (State +
 1068:            lists:sum([rand:uniform(1 bsl 48) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 999)]))
 1069:           div 1000,
 1070:       Count + 1).
 1071: 
 1072: %%-----------------
 1073: %% Throughput speed
 1074: 
 1075: throughput_0(Config) ->
 1076:     run_nodepair_test(
 1077:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1078:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 0)
 1079:       end, Config).
 1080: 
 1081: throughput_64(Config) ->
 1082:     run_nodepair_test(
 1083:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1084:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 64)
 1085:       end, Config).
 1086: 
 1087: throughput_1024(Config) ->
 1088:     run_nodepair_test(
 1089:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1090:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 10000 * Effort, 1024)
 1091:       end, Config).
 1092: 
 1093: throughput_4096(Config) ->
 1094:     run_nodepair_test(
 1095:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1096:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 5000 * Effort, 4096)
 1097:       end, Config).
 1098: 
 1099: throughput_16384(Config) ->
 1100:     run_nodepair_test(
 1101:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1102:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 1000 * Effort, 16384)
 1103:       end, Config).
 1104: 
 1105: throughput_65536(Config) ->
 1106:     run_nodepair_test(
 1107:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1108:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 200 * Effort, 65536)
 1109:       end, Config).
 1110: 
 1111: throughput_262144(Config) ->
 1112:     run_nodepair_test(
 1113:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1114:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50 * Effort, 262144)
 1115:       end, Config).
 1116: 
 1117: throughput_1048576(Config) ->
 1118:     run_nodepair_test(
 1119:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1120:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 20 * Effort, 1048576)
 1121:       end, Config).
 1122: 
 1123: throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, Packets, Size) ->
 1124:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1125:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1126:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
 1127:     #{time := Time,
 1128:       client_msacc_stats := ClientMsaccStats,
 1129:       client_prof := ClientProf,
 1130:       server_msacc_stats := ServerMsaccStats,
 1131:       server_prof := ServerProf,
 1132:       server_gc_before := Server_GC_Before,
 1133:       server_gc_after := Server_GC_After} =
 1134:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> throughput_runner(A, B, Packets, Size) end),
 1135:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1136:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1137:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
 1138:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1139:         msacc:print(ClientMsaccStats),
 1140:     Overhead =
 1141:         50 % Distribution protocol headers (empirical) (TLS+=54)
 1142:         + byte_size(erlang:term_to_binary([0|<<>>])), % Benchmark overhead
 1143:     Bytes = Packets * (Size + Overhead),
 1144:     io:format("~w bytes, ~.4g s~n", [Bytes,Time/1000000]),
 1145:     SizeString = integer_to_list(Size),
 1146:     _ = report(
 1147:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
 1148:     _ = report(
 1149:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
 1150:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1151:         report(
 1152:           Prefix ++ " Sender_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1153:           round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ClientMsaccStats)
 1154:                 * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1155:           "ps/byte"),
 1156:     ServerMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1157:         begin
 1158:             report(
 1159:               Prefix ++ " Receiver_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1160:               round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ServerMsaccStats)
 1161:                     * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1162:               "ps/byte"),
 1163:             msacc:print(ServerMsaccStats)
 1164:         end,
 1165:     io:format("******* ClientProf:~n", []), prof_print(ClientProf),
 1166:     io:format("******* ServerProf:~n", []), prof_print(ServerProf),
 1167:     io:format("******* Server GC Before:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_Before]),
 1168:     io:format("******* Server GC After:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_After]),
 1169:     Speed = round((Bytes * 1000000) / (1024 * Time)),
 1170:     report(
 1171:       Prefix ++ " Throughput_" ++ SizeString, Speed, "kB/s " ++ MemSuffix).
 1172: 
 1173: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
 1174: throughput_runner(A, B, Rounds, Size) ->
 1175:     Payload = payload(Size),
 1176:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
 1177:     ClientPid = self(),
 1178:     ServerPid =
 1179:         erlang:spawn_opt(
 1180:           B,
 1181:           fun () -> throughput_server(ClientPid, Rounds) end,
 1182:           [{message_queue_data, off_heap}]),
 1183:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
 1184:     msacc_available() andalso
 1185:         begin
 1186:             msacc:stop(),
 1187:             msacc:reset(),
 1188:             msacc:start(),
 1189:             ok
 1190:         end,
 1191:     prof_start(),
 1192:     #{time := Time} = Result =
 1193:         throughput_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, Payload, Rounds),
 1194:     prof_stop(),
 1195:     MsaccStats =
 1196:         case msacc_available() of
 1197:             true ->
 1198:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1199:                 msacc:stop(),
 1200:                 MStats;
 1201:             false ->
 1202:                 undefined
 1203:         end,
 1204:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1205:     Result#{time := microseconds(Time),
 1206:             client_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1207:             client_prof => Prof}.
 1208: 
 1209: throughput_server(Pid, N) ->
 1210:     GC_Before = get_server_gc_info(),
 1211:     %% dbg:tracer(port, dbg:trace_port(file, "throughput_server_gc.log")),
 1212:     %% dbg:p(TLSDistReceiver, garbage_collection),
 1213:     msacc_available() andalso
 1214:         begin
 1215:             msacc:stop(),
 1216:             msacc:reset(),
 1217:             msacc:start(),
 1218:             ok
 1219:         end,
 1220:     prof_start(),
 1221:     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N).
 1222: 
 1223: throughput_server_loop(_Pid, GC_Before, 0) ->
 1224:     prof_stop(),
 1225:     MsaccStats =
 1226:         case msacc_available() of
 1227:             true ->
 1228:                 msacc:stop(),
 1229:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1230:                 msacc:reset(),
 1231:                 MStats;
 1232:             false ->
 1233:                 undefined
 1234:         end,
 1235:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1236:     %% dbg:flush_trace_port(),
 1237:     exit(#{server_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1238:            server_prof => Prof,
 1239:            server_gc_before => GC_Before,
 1240:            server_gc_after => get_server_gc_info()});
 1241: throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N) ->
 1242:     receive
 1243:         Msg ->
 1244:             case Msg of
 1245:                 {Pid, N, _} ->
 1246:                     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N - 1);
 1247:                 Other ->
 1248:                     erlang:error({self(),?FUNCTION_NAME,Other})
 1249:             end
 1250:     end.
 1251: 
 1252: get_server_gc_info() ->
 1253:     case whereis(ssl_connection_sup_dist) of
 1254:         undefined ->
 1255:             undefined;
 1256:         SupPid ->
 1257:             [{_Id,TLSDistReceiver,_Type,_Modules}|_] =
 1258:                 supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1259:             erlang:process_info(
 1260:               TLSDistReceiver, [garbage_collection,garbage_collection_info])
 1261:     end.
 1262: 
 1263: throughput_client(Pid, Mon, Payload, N) ->
 1264:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, start_time()).
 1265: 
 1266: throughput_client_loop(_Pid, Mon, _Payload, 0, StartTime) ->
 1267:     receive
 1268:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, #{} = Result} ->
 1269:             Result#{time => elapsed_time(StartTime)};
 1270:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
 1271:             exit(Other)
 1272:     end;
 1273: throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, StartTime) ->
 1274:     Pid ! {self(), N, Payload},
 1275:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N - 1, StartTime).
 1276: 
 1277: 
 1278: -define(prof, none). % none | cprof | eprof
 1279: 
 1280: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1281: prof_start() ->
 1282:     cprof:stop(),
 1283:     cprof:start(),
 1284:     ok.
 1285: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1286: prof_start() ->
 1287:     catch eprof:stop(),
 1288:     {ok,_} = eprof:start(),
 1289:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling(processes()),
 1290:     ok.
 1291: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1292: prof_start() ->
 1293:     ok.
 1294: -endif.
 1295: 
 1296: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1297: prof_stop() ->
 1298:     cprof:pause(),
 1299:     ok.
 1300: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1301: prof_stop() ->
 1302:     _ = eprof:stop_profiling(),
 1303:     ok.
 1304: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1305: prof_stop() ->
 1306:     ok.
 1307: -endif.
 1308: 
 1309: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1310: prof_end() ->
 1311:     Prof = cprof:analyse(),
 1312:     cprof:stop(),
 1313:     Prof.
 1314: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1315: prof_end() ->
 1316:     eprof:dump_data().
 1317: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1318: prof_end() ->
 1319:     [].
 1320: -endif.
 1321: 
 1322: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1323: prof_print(Prof) ->
 1324:     io:format("~p.~n", [Prof]).
 1325: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1326: prof_print(Dump) ->
 1327:     eprof:analyze(undefined, total, [], Dump).
 1328: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1329: prof_print([]) ->
 1330:     ok.
 1331: -endif.
 1332: 
 1333: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 1334: %%% Test cases helpers
 1335: 
 1336: run_nodepair_test(TestFun, Config) ->
 1337:     A = proplists:get_value({client,1}, Config),
 1338:     B = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
 1339:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
 1340:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
 1341:     HA = start_ssl_node({client,1}, Config),
 1342:     try
 1343:         HB = start_ssl_node(server, Config),
 1344:         try TestFun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB)
 1345:         after
 1346:             stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config)
 1347:         end
 1348:     after
 1349:         stop_ssl_node({client,1}, HA, Config)
 1350:     end.
 1351: 
 1352: ssl_apply(Handle, M, F, Args) ->
 1353:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, M, F, Args) of
 1354:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1355:             error(Reason);
 1356:         Result ->
 1357:             Result
 1358:     end.
 1359: 
 1360: ssl_apply(Handle, Fun) ->
 1361:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, Fun) of
 1362:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1363:             error(Reason);
 1364:         Result ->
 1365:             Result
 1366:     end.
 1367: 
 1368: start_ssl_node(Spec, Config) ->
 1369:     start_ssl_node(Spec, Config, 0).
 1370: %%
 1371: start_ssl_node({client, N}, Config, Verbose) ->
 1372:     Name = proplists:get_value({client_name, N}, Config),
 1373:     Args = get_node_args({client_dist_args, N}, Config),
 1374:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1375:     ssl_dist_test_lib:start_ssl_node(
 1376:       Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose);
 1377: start_ssl_node(server, Config, Verbose) ->
 1378:     Name = proplists:get_value(server_name, Config),
 1379:     Args = get_node_args(server_dist_args, Config),
 1380:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1381:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1382:     erpc:call(
 1383:       ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, start_ssl_node,
 1384:       [Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose]).
 1385: 
 1386: stop_ssl_node({client, _}, HA, _Config) ->
 1387:     ssl_dist_test_lib:stop_ssl_node(HA);
 1388: stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config) ->
 1389:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1390:     erpc:call(ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, stop_ssl_node, [HB]).
 1391: 
 1392: get_node_args(Tag, Config) ->
 1393:     case proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config) of
 1394:         true ->
 1395:             case proplists:get_value(ktls, Config, false) of
 1396:                 true ->
 1397:                     "-ssl_dist_opt client_ktls true server_ktls true ";
 1398:                 false ->
 1399:                     ""
 1400:             end ++ proplists:get_value(Tag, Config);
 1401:         false ->
 1402:             proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_args, Config, "")
 1403:     end.
 1404: 
 1405: 
 1406: 
 1407: payload(Size) ->
 1408:     iolist_to_binary(
 1409:       [case Size bsr 8 of
 1410:            0 ->
 1411:                [];
 1412:            Blocks ->
 1413:                payload(Blocks, create_binary(256))
 1414:        end | create_binary(Size band 255)]).
 1415: %%
 1416: payload(0, _) ->
 1417:     [];
 1418: payload(Blocks, Block) ->
 1419:     Half = payload(Blocks bsr 1, Block),
 1420:     [Half, Half |
 1421:      if
 1422:          Blocks band 1 =:= 1 ->
 1423:              Block;
 1424:          true ->
 1425:              []
 1426:      end].
 1427: 
 1428: create_binary(Size) ->
 1429:     create_binary(Size, <<>>).
 1430: %%
 1431: create_binary(0, Bin) ->
 1432:     Bin;
 1433: create_binary(Size, Bin) ->
 1434:     NextSize = Size - 1,
 1435:     create_binary(NextSize, <<Bin/binary, NextSize>>).
 1436: 
 1437: start_time() ->
 1438:     erlang:system_time().
 1439: 
 1440: elapsed_time(StartTime) ->
 1441:     erlang:system_time() - StartTime.
 1442: 
 1443: microseconds(Time) ->
 1444:     erlang:convert_time_unit(Time, native, microsecond).
 1445: 
 1446: report(Name, Value, Suffix) ->
 1447:     ?CT_PAL("~s: ~w ~s", [Name, Value, Suffix]),
 1448:     ct_event:notify(
 1449:       #event{
 1450:          name = benchmark_data,
 1451:          data = [{value, Value}, {suite, "ssl_dist"}, {name, Name}]}),
 1452:     {comment, term_to_string(Value) ++ " " ++ Suffix}.
 1453: 
 1454: term_to_string(Term) ->
 1455:     unicode:characters_to_list(
 1456:       io_lib:write(Term, [{encoding, unicode}])).
 1457: 
 1458: msacc_available() ->
 1459:     msacc:available().
 1460: 
 1461: 
 1462: mem_start(HA, HB) ->
 1463:     MemA = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1464:     MemB = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1465:     {MemA, MemB}.
 1466: 
 1467: mem_stop(HA, HB, Mem1) ->
 1468:     MemA2 = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1469:     MemB2 = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1470:     mem_result(mem_diff(Mem1, {MemA2, MemB2})).
 1471: 
 1472: mem_diff({MemA1, MemB1}, {MemA2, MemB2}) ->
 1473:     {MemA2 - MemA1, MemB2 - MemB1}.
 1474: 
 1475: mem_result({MemDiffA, MemDiffB}) ->
 1476:     MemSuffix =
 1477:         io_lib:format(
 1478:           "~.5g|~.5g MByte", [MemDiffA / (1 bsl 20), MemDiffB / (1 bsl 20)]),
 1479:     {round(MemDiffA / (1 bsl 10)), round(MemDiffB / (1 bsl 10)), MemSuffix}.
 1480: 
 1481: memory(Type) ->
 1482:     try erlang:memory(Type)
 1483:     catch error : notsup ->
 1484:             0
 1485:     end.
 1486: 
 1487: -ifdef(undefined).
 1488: 
 1489: mem() ->
 1490:     lists:foldl(
 1491:       fun ({Type, F}, Acc) ->
 1492:               F*memory(Type) + Acc
 1493:       end, 0,
 1494:       [{total, 1}, {processes, -1}, {atom, -1}, {code, -1},
 1495:        {processes_used, 1}, {atom_used, 1}]).
 1496: 
 1497: -else.
 1498: 
 1499: mem() ->
 1500:     {_Current, _MaxSince, MaxEver} =
 1501:         traverse(
 1502:           fun mem/3,
 1503:           [erlang:system_info({allocator_sizes, Alloc})
 1504:            || Alloc <- erlang:system_info(alloc_util_allocators)],
 1505:           {0, 0, 0}),
 1506:     MaxEver - memory(code). % Kind of assuming code stays allocated
 1507: 
 1508: %% allocator_sizes traversal fun
 1509: mem(
 1510:   T = {instance, _, L}, [], Acc)
 1511:   when is_list(L) ->
 1512:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1513: mem(
 1514:   T = {_, L}, [{instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1515:   when is_list(L) ->
 1516:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1517: mem(
 1518:   T = {blocks, L}, [{_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1519:   when is_list(L) ->
 1520:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1521: mem(
 1522:   T = {_, L}, [{blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1523:   when is_list(L) ->
 1524:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1525: mem(
 1526:   {size, Current, MaxSince, MaxEver},
 1527:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1528:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1529:     {0, {C + Current, S + MaxSince, E + MaxEver}};
 1530: mem(
 1531:   {size, Current},
 1532:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1533:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1534:     %% Use Current as Max since we do not have any Max values
 1535:     %% XXX future improvement when that gets added to
 1536:     %% erlang:system_info(allocator_sizes, _)
 1537:     {0, {C + Current, S + Current, E + Current}};
 1538: mem(_, _, Acc) ->
 1539:     {0, Acc}.
 1540: 
 1541: %% Traverse (Fold) over all lists in a deep term;
 1542: %% descend into the selected element of a tuple;
 1543: %% record the descent Path and supply it to Fun
 1544: %%
 1545: %% Acc cannot be an integer
 1546: traverse(Fun, Term, Acc) ->
 1547:     traverse(Fun, Term, [], Acc).
 1548: %%
 1549: traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc) ->
 1550:     if
 1551:         is_list(Term) ->
 1552:             traverse_list(Fun, Term, Path, Acc);
 1553:         is_tuple(Term) ->
 1554:             case Fun(Term, Path, Acc) of
 1555:                 {0, NewAcc} ->
 1556:                     NewAcc;
 1557:                 {N, NewAcc} when is_integer(N) ->
 1558:                     traverse(Fun, element(N, Term), [Term | Path], NewAcc)
 1559:             end;
 1560:         true ->
 1561:             Acc
 1562:     end.
 1563: 
 1564: traverse_list(Fun, [Term | Terms], Path, Acc) ->
 1565:     NewAcc = traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc),
 1566:     traverse_list(Fun, Terms, Path, NewAcc);
 1567: traverse_list(_Fun, [], _Path, Acc) ->
 1568:     Acc.
 1569: 
 1570: -endif.
